snippet: The flight was the first since the Federal Aviation Administration gave Boeing permission on Thursday to conduct in-flight tests.
abstract: Boeing 787 Dreamliner test plane flies for more than two hours to gather information about problems with batteries that led to worldwide grounding of the new jets; flight is first since the Federal Aviation Administration gave Boeing permission to conduct in-flight tests.
lead_paragraph: The flight was the first since the Federal Aviation Administration gave Boeing permission on Thursday to conduct in-flight tests.
